ygData.subject: Re: Since you brought it up
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s exactly it, later you get the stats with out the bad effects. I ve heard it helps raise regen rates as well but I ve yet to notice that. The other
ygData.messageBody:
>From: silky@...
>
>Perhaps if it gets high enough, you get the increased stats without the
>side effects - but still - is this just something that the dev team got a
>chuckle out of - or is it useful to build?
>

That's exactly it, later you get the stats with out the bad effects.
I've heard it helps raise regen rates as well but I've yet to notice that.

The other thing I've suggested was to have bard songs actually have a
slightly better effect when drinking. Instead of say +19 str, +22 str or
whatever. Nothing major but more to make it fun.

-TopFlite
Fendryl Istalindir, HalfElven (Drunken) Minstrel of Tarrew Marr
